title.rendered: Your ultimate spring getaway starts here!

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

Pamper yourself. Soak up the first rays of sun and wake up in among fresh crisp sheets. Add some glamour to your morning routine in the ambience of our relaxing en-suite marble bathroom, stocked with L’Occitane toiletries.

 

Start your day off right, enjoy a sumptuous breakfast served in the privacy of your room, or relish in the atmosphere of the elegant Zinfandel’s restaurant, with its stunning crystal chandeliers and views of the city, for a true fine-dining morning.

 

Plan your perfect escape and indulge in the comforts of this charming oasis in the heart of Zagreb.
Get up to 20% off
  • BOOK NOW! Click here
Contact us!
T. 00 385 1 45 666 00
E. reservations@esplanade.hr

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
